spsys 0.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Estimation of Sampling Variance for Systematic Sampling Surveys with spsys

Reference

All functions

compare_estimators()

Using subsampling, assess a series of variance estimators.

get_hex_neighborhoods()

For some input set of neighborhood center points return all immediate hexagonal neighbors.

get_mat_hex_neighborhoods()

The Matern estimator does not use 'centers' per se but rather 'anchors'. Also, a set of contrasts is needed for each neighborhood.

index_hex_polys()

Creates a dataframe of hexagon indices for use in subsample_hex

index_sq()

Creates a dataframe of hexagon indices for use in subsample_sq.

pop_var()

Calculate the variance using a denominator of n instead of n-1

rect_pts

Simulated data arranged in a rectangular grid.

so_att()

Computes the Stevens and Olsen estimator for a specific attribute. Used internally with var_so function.

subsample()

Subsamples a dataframe of hexagonal indices produced by the index_hex function. For some specified starting index and sampling interval, subsamples a hexagonal index set such that the spatial structure is preserved, i.e. subsamples also retain a hexagonal structure.

subsample_hex_ix_compact()

There is a way to subsample a set of hexagonal indices such that we obtain a compact set of neighborhoods. Implemented here.

subsample_hex_ix_ov()

Creates a set of indices such that their nearest neighbors create the overlapping structure

subsample_starts()

For a given sampling interval, return the set of all possible starting positions

transform_coords()

Transforms a set of population unit coordinates to an integer index.

VarDC()

D'Orazio's estimator based on Geary's C

VarDI()

D'Orazio's estimator based on Moran's I

VarMAT()

Matérn (1986) local variance estimator

VarNON()

Non-overlapping stratified random sampling estimator

VarOut-class

Base class for all variance outputs

VarSO()

Neighborhood-based estimator from Stevens and Olsen (2003) .

VarSRS()

Variance estimator assuming simple random sampling

VarSYS()

Systematic variance

var_so()

Computes the variance estimate of a systematic sample using the Stevens and Olsen (2003) local mean estimator.
